Class ThinBevelBorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.border.AbstractBorder
      • javax.swing.border.BevelBorder
        • de.mpa.client.ui.ThinBevelBorder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Border

    public class ThinBevelBorder
extends BevelBorder
    A class which implements a simple one-line bevel border.
    Author:
    Alex Behne
    See Also:

      Constructor and Description
      ThinBevelBorder(int bevelType)
      Creates a thin bevel border with the specified type and whose colors will be derived from the background color of the component passed into the paintBorder method.
